FAIL_TO_PASS: when option term longest return option length
when program has subcommands then has automatic help command
when just help command then returns length of help term
when program has command with optional arg then appears in help
when multiple commands then returns longest length
styleArgumentText
when add two arguments using .arguments then two arguments
styleSubcommandText
when override createArgument then used for arguments()
when add arguments using multiple methods then all added
when add "[arg]" using .arguments then argument optional
when add "arg" using .command then argument required
when add "<arg...>" using .command then argument required and variadic
when arguments described in deprecated way and empty description then arguments still included in helpInformation
when add "<arg>" using .command then argument required
when add "[arg...]" using .command then argument optional and variadic
when add two arguments using .command then two arguments
when command term longest return command length
when add "arg" using .arguments then argument required
when add "[arg]" using .command then argument optional
